code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./Loading.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Loading(_ref){let{url}=_ref;const[currentStep,setCurrentStep]=useState(0);const steps=[{text:'Connexion au site...',icon:'üîó'},{text:'Analyse de la page d\'accueil...',icon:'üè†'},{text:'D√©couverte des pages importantes...',icon:'üîç'},{text:'Crawl des pages d√©tect√©es...',icon:'üìÑ'},{text:'Extraction des donn√©es SEO...',icon:'üìä'},{text:'Extraction des donn√©es IA...',icon:'ü§ñ'},{text:'Calcul des scores...',icon:'üìà'},{text:'Finalisation de l\'analyse...',icon:'‚úÖ'}];useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{setCurrentStep(prev=>{if(prev<steps.length-1){return prev+1;}return prev;});},800);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[steps.length]);const currentStepData=steps[currentStep];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loading-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-spinner",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"spinner"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"loading-title",children:"Analyse en cours"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"loading-url",children:url}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-steps",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loading-step active",style:{animation:'fadeIn 0.3s ease-out'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"step-icon",children:currentStepData.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"step-text",children:currentStepData.text})]},currentStep)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-progress",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-progress-bar",style:{width:"".concat(Math.min((currentStep+1)/steps.length*100,95),"%")}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"loading-hint",children:"\u23F1\uFE0F Cette analyse peut prendre jusqu'\xE0 5 minutes pour un crawl complet..."})]})});}export default Loading;
